name: Uncomplicated Life Simulator
description:
Uncomplicated Life Simulator is a simple game that proposes an easy objective: finding happiness!

Of course, sometimes things are harder than they look, and maybe you'll need some time to finally get to the desired ending.

If you happen to do so, you'll unlock a SUPER CRAZY MODE, that will test your final determination, in a game that has no other reason beyond giving a small amount of entertainment for a couple of afternoons.
